model.storage

Class Warehouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.storage.Warehouse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IObservable, IProductGroup

    public class Warehouse
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObservable, IProductGroup, java.io.Serializable
    The warehouse holds all the products.
    See Also:

      • addProduct

        public void addProduct(Product product)
        Adds a product to the warehouse. If the product already exists, only increase its amount.
        Specified by:
        addProduct in interface IProductGroup
        Parameters:
        product - the product to be added.

      • deleteProduct

        Deletes all the product with the given name.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • removeProduct

        public Product removeProduct(java.lang.String productName,
                             int amount)
        Removes product from the warehouse. If a product ran out, notifies observers of this fact.
        Specified by:
        removeProduct in interface IProductGroup
        Parameters:
        productName - name of the product to be removed.
        amount - amount to be removed.
        Returns:
        the removed product or null if the product doesn't exist or there's not enough of it.

      • findProduct

        public Product findProduct(java.lang.String productName)
        Finds product by the given name.
        Specified by:
        findProduct in interface IProductGroup
        Parameters:
        productName - name of the product to be found.
        Returns:
        the found product.

      • findProduct

        public Product findProduct(int amount)
        Finds the first product with the given amount. Used mostly to look for a sold-out product (amount == 0).
        Parameters:
        amount - amount of the product to be found.
        Returns:
        the found product.
